item.description:
Directions: http://www.prudential...

Map (look at the upper left corner for the Terrace Food Court): http://www.prudential...

As you may know by now, we try to have a large meetup at least once or twice each month. This gives everyone an opportunity to come and make new friends, practice their Japanese or English, and enjoy dinner with a bunch of interesting people from around the Boston area (and overseas). Come on by, relax, practice in either language of your choice, and enjoy being part of our growing community!

By the way, we typically stay in the very back of the Prudential Food Court and should have little signs that say "meetup.com" as table markers (unless I forget them ... which I often do :P ). Also, if you're interested in getting dinner, most of us go out to eat afterwards.

We look forward to seeing you there!
item.name: Prudential Social Meetup
